name: Charles Adventures: Lock and Load
description:
Charles Adventures: Lock and Load is an all new experience within the Mindhive franchise! 

FIGHT!

Pick up powerups and journey through enemies that power up through every room!

DEFEND!

Dash through many types of enemies!

- Imps

- Ghosts

- Spiders

ALL PLATFORM MAYHEM!

Lock and Load on your MAC, Windows or Linux PC or take it with you and continue on your mobile device!

Available for free!
